content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (22.5, -7.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (22.5, -7.5)
- Boiler at position (20.5, -4.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (4.5, -10.5)
- Pipe network connecting the boiler and steam engine
- Small electric poles at various positions for power distribution

### Iron Plate Production at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-3.5, 2.5) storing iron ore and iron plates
- Inserter at position (-3.5, 1.5) waiting for source items

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-11.0, 20.0) and a wooden chest at position (-11.5, 18.5) storing iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (5.0, 5.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Inserter at position (7.5, 5.5) waiting for source items
- Wooden Chest at position (8.5, 5.5) storing copper plates
- Inserter at position (9.5, 5.5) transferring items to a belt group

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (10.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at position (10.5, 0.5) with a shortage of copper plates
- Inserters and small electric poles for item transfer and power
- Belt group connecting the furnace at position (5.0, 5.0) to the assembling machine at position (10.5, 0.5)

### Pipe Networks
- PipeGroup at position (20.5, -10.5) handling steam
- PipeGroup at position (4.5, -9.5) handling water
- PipeGroup at position (19.5, -2.5) handling water

### Electricity Network
- ElectricityGroup with poles at various positions providing power to connected entities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Insufficient Inventory
- Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. For example, attempting to insert coal into a boiler without having coal in the inventory.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Check that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Ensure that the production chain is not interrupted and that resources are adequately supplied.

### Errors with Assembling Machines Missing Ingredients
- Ensure that the assembling machine has all the required ingredients available. In this case, make sure copper plates are supplied to the assembling machine to produce copper cables.

### Errors with Furnaces Having No Ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary raw materials to process. Check the supply chain to ensure continuous production.

By addressing these errors, you can improve the efficiency and productivity of your factory setup.
